anthropic_key_uuid.description: Optional Anthropic API key ID to use with Anthropic models

description.description: A text description of the agent, not used in inference

instruction.description: Agent instruction. Instructions help your agent to perform its job effectively. See [Write Effective Agent Instructions](https://docs.digitalocean.com/products/genai-platform/concepts/best-practices/#agent-instructions) for best practices.
instruction.example: "You are an agent who thinks deeply about the world"

knowledge_base_uuid.description: Ids of the knowledge base(s) to attach to the agent

open_ai_key_uuid.description: Optional OpenAI API key ID to use with OpenAI models

project_id.description: The id of the DigitalOcean project this agent will belong to

region.description: The DigitalOcean region to deploy your agent in

tags.description: Agent tag to organize related resources
